about_the_game:
Features

  • More than 20 fully original artworks

  • Collect kinks and spend them to earn even more kinks

  • Unlock new Waifus by clicking and giving them some love!

  • Unlock and strategize upgrades

Nany is a passionate card game enthusiast with a particular love for poker. She thrives on the thrill of strategy and outsmarting her opponents. Whether she’s playing a casual game with friends or competing in high-stakes tournaments, Nany approaches every hand with a mix of skill and confidence. Her calm demeanor hides the intense focus she applies to every game.

Cloe is a sweet but spoiled rich girl who has grown bored of her luxurious life. She craves excitement and a sense of purpose, often finding herself lost in trivial hobbies just to pass the time. While she can be naive about the world outside her wealth, she’s charming and endearing, eager to explore new adventures in hopes of breaking free from her sheltered existence.

Blue is a fun and energetic gamer girl who spends most of her free time immersed in video games and streaming her gameplay online. With a sharp sense of humor and a love for challenging her friends in various games, she has built a dedicated following. Her casual, relatable personality makes her the heart of any group, but when it comes to gaming, she’s fiercely competitive.

name: Sexy Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A clicker game about getting Waifus! Discover every character in that challenging strategy clicker game, even with one hand!
